about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: The intersection of design, code, and cognitive science.
about.intro: I'm Willian Cardoso, a Lead Product Designer with 7+ years at IBM, where I've designed enterprise SaaS products used by thousands of users worldwide. My unique background bridges design, engineering, and neuroscience — giving me a perspective that goes beyond pixels.

dev.title: Started at IBM
dev.description: Joined IBM as a JavaScript intern, building internal tools. Learned to think like an engineer, understand technical constraints, and speak the language of development teams.

design.title: Transitioned to UX/UI Design
design.description: Discovered my true passion was solving user problems, not just writing code. Made the leap to design while keeping my technical foundation — a combination that became my superpower.

senior.title: Senior Product Designer
senior.description: Led complete redesigns of enterprise configurators and dashboards. Reduced support tickets by 40%, onboarding time by 60%. Learned to measure impact in business metrics, not just pixels.

lead.title: Lead Product Designer & Service Designer
lead.description: Evolved from screen-level thinking to service design. Now orchestrating end-to-end experiences across multiple touchpoints, leading design systems, and mentoring other designers.

neuro.title: Adding Neuroscience
neuro.description: Started Neuroscience degree and Data Analytics post-grad. Research in Computational Neuroscience, applying NLP to preserve indigenous languages. Bringing scientific rigor to design decisions.
